Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: heartwarming \heart"warm`ing\, heart-warming \heart"-warm`ing\adj. causing gladness and pleasure; -- used mostly of the actions of people, and sometimes of animals; as, Is there a sight more heart-warming than a family reunion?. [WordNet 1.5]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: heartwarming \heart"warm`ing\, heart-warming \heart"-warm`ing\adj. causing gladness and pleasure; -- used mostly of the actions of people, and sometimes of animals; as, Is there a sight more heart-warming than a family reunion?. [WordNet 1.5]
heartwarming adj : causing gladness and pleasure; "Is there a sight more heartwarming than a family reunion?"
